Package backend

Class Tag

java.lang.Object
backend.Tag
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Tag
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Tag class that defines tagName, taggedFiles and controls adding and removing taggedFiles to the file list that is stored in alphabetical order
See Also:
Serialized Form
